name: Custom Dress Designed just for YOU by Sew Priddy (6-12Mo. to size 13/14)
description:
Does your little one have a favorite character, movie, tv show, pop icon, team, hobby, or restaurant? Sew Priddy custom creations are perfect as gifts, are great for photo shoots, vacations, or special occasions, and are comfortable and stylish for daily wear. 

Dresses can be created with one of your own special t-shirts or one from our large collection. Our designers will communicate with you via email to get all of your specific desires for size, sleeve length, colors, characters, etc. Pricing reflects basic dress options such as dress style, sleeve style, knit fabric, etc. It does not include pants/leggings, rush orders, silk screens, hoods, special order tees, or special order fabric. We can make dresses from size 6-12 months all the way up to size 13/14. If for some reason we are not able to meet your specific requests, you have the option to cancel the order for a full refund.

Sew Priddy offers coordinating doll dresses. If you would like a doll dress with your order, please select that option from the drop down menu below. Doll dresses fit 10” and 15” dolls such as American Girl, Bitty Baby, Pottery Barn, Waldorf dolls, or other similarly-sized dolls.

You should receive an email from our designers within one business day from the time you submit your order. Please allow 2-4 weeks for completion from the date we receive your complete custom request. We do all we can to finish all dresses much sooner, but this estimate allows us adequate time to find the perfect coordinating fabrics for your order. If you need a rush order, please let us know, and we can discuss the rush options currently available. We take great pride in making one-of-a-kind pieces that you are sure to love!

In case the full drop down menus are not visible in older versions of IE, here are the 4 options listed in order below:
Sew Priddy Custom Dress - $45
Sew Priddy Custom Dress + Coordinating Doll Dress - $65
Sew Priddy Custom Dress made with Customer's provided tee - $40
Custom Dress made with Customer's provided tee + Coordinating Doll Dress - $60
Double Ruffle Sew Priddy Custom Dress - $55
Double Ruffle Sew Priddy Custom Dress made with Customer's provided tee - $50

options.name: Custom Dress w Customer's tee w doll dress
Double Ruffle Sew Priddy Custom Dress
Double Ruffle Custom Dress w Customer's tee

name: Custom Twirl Skirt - Designed just for YOU by Sew Priddy
description: Does your little one have a favorite character, movie, tv show, pop icon, team, hobby, or restaurant? Sew Priddy custom creations are perfect as gifts, are great for photo shoots, vacations, or special occasions, and are comfortable and stylish for daily wear. Skirts can be created with one of your own special t-shirts or one from our large collection. Our designers will communicate with you via email to get all of your specific desires for colors, characters, etc. Pricing reflects basic skirt options such as one ruffle, knit fabric, etc. It does not include pants/leggings, rush orders, silk screens, special order tees, extra ruffles, or special order fabric. We can make skirts from size 12 months all the way up to size 13/14 (if you need bigger, please ask). If for some reason we are not able to meet your specific requests, you have the option to cancel the order for a full refund. Below is our skirt sizing chart. Note the measurements are approximate and the skirt may be a bit longer with the addition of the ruffle. Sizes | Hip (unstretched – stretched) | Length 12-18M | 15” – 20” | 10” 24M/2T | 16” – 21” | 10.25” 3T/4T | 17” – 22” | 11.25” 5/6 | 18” – 24” | 12” 7/8 | 19.5”- 26” | 12.25” 9/10 | 20” – 28” | 14.25” 11/12 | 21” – 30” | 15” 13/14 | 23.5” – 32” | 15.25” You should receive an email from our designers within one business day from the time you submit your order. Please allow 2-4 weeks for completion from the date we receive your complete custom request. We do all we can to finish all skirts and dresses much sooner, but this estimate allows us adequate time to find the perfect coordinating fabrics for your order. If you need a rush order, please let us know, and we can discuss the rush options currently available. We take great pride in making one-of-a-kind pieces that you are sure to love!

name: Custom Short Set Designed just for YOU size 6-12m to 13/14
description:
Does your little one have a favorite character, movie, tv show, pop icon, team, hobby, or restaurant? Sew Priddy custom creations are perfect as gifts, are great for photo shoots, vacations, or special occasions, and are comfortable and stylish for daily wear. 

Short sets can be created with one of your own special t-shirts or one from our large collection. Our designers will communicate with you via email to get all of your specific desires for colors, characters, etc. Pricing reflects basic options such as one ruffle, knit fabric, etc. It does not include rush orders, silk screens, special order tees, extra ruffles, or special order fabric. We can make short sets from size 6-12 months all the way up to size 13/14. If for some reason we are not able to meet your specific requests, you have the option to cancel the order for a full refund.

You should receive an email from our designers within one business day from the time you submit your order. Please allow 2-4 weeks for completion from the date we receive your complete custom request. We do all we can to finish all sets, skirts and dresses much sooner, but this estimate allows us adequate time to find the perfect coordinating fabrics for your order. If you need a rush order, please let us know, and we can discuss the rush options currently available. We take great pride in making one-of-a-kind pieces that you are sure to love!

name: **SOLD OUT** Royal Couture Princess Custom Dress - OOAK Find
description:
Royal Couture Princess Custom Dress One Of A Kind Find - This beautiful shirt is studded with rhinestones and is cream and brown. Paired with it are some potential fabrics we may use when making the custom piece (Note: that bottom fabric is brown damask -- it looks dark in the photo). We also have other yummy brown fabrics that may be used instead (it will depend on the size and other variables).

Our designers will communicate with you via email to get all of your specific desires for size, sleeve length, etc. Pricing reflects basic dress options such as dress style, sleeve style, knit fabric, etc. It does not include pants/leggings, rush orders, silk screens, hoods, special order tees, or special order fabric. We can make this specific OOAK Find in any size from size 6-12 months all the way up to size 13/14 (above a size 5/6 we will use extra fabrics on the sides). 

You should receive an email from our designers within one business day from the time you submit your order. Please allow 1-3 weeks for completion from the date we receive your complete custom request. We do all we can to finish all dresses much sooner, but this estimate allows us adequate time to find the perfect coordinating fabrics for your order. If you need a rush order, please let us know, and we can discuss the rush options currently available. We take great pride in making one-of-a-kind pieces that you are sure to love!

name: **SOLD OUT** Fight Like a Girl Dress – Size 7/8
description: Fight Like a Girl Dress – Size 7/8 with light ruching under the collar for some extra girly flair. As a symbol of female strength and empowerment, Wonder Woman perfectly symbolizes the fighting spirit each cancer survivor embodies. Help create awareness with this custom piece and wear it proudly. We are excited to be part of a charity auction benefiting Ashley of Lil Blue Boo. I can’t say enough good things about Ashley – she’s inspiring and her blogs and clothing are amazing. Ashley reminds us to “Choose Joy” no matter what we are battling in life. One of her most moving blog entries is this one, but I warn you, you may need a box of tissues: Rite of Passage Video. Ashley has put a smile on our faces and our daughter’s face and changes people's lives for the better daily, and we hope to return the favor. Please be sure to check out the details of the auction at http://evystree.com/blog/?p=1656. We will this dress listed, as well as two others, and 200+ other vendors will be displaying amazing work. Don’t miss it starting February 27, 2012 at 11 pm EST/ 8 pm PST. It will run until February 29, 2012. The auction will be at www.hyenacart.com/stores/teamashley Measurements: Chest: 13" across the front approximately 26” total Length: 25 1/2" Sleeves: Short sleeves Please see sizing for more information about the sizing measurements. UPDATE: this dress raised $102 in the auction! Thanks again to all of the generous bidders and donors for making the auction a huge success!
